name: trakster
description: Bicycle craigslist: •	Buyer and seller •	Users can create their own blogs •	Users can create their own posts •	Users can search for who is buying a particular bike and who is selling a bike •	Users can possibly PM •	Users can use email the buyer or seller •	Comments on post can •	Seperate button for Buying and Selling •	Price as well??? •	Location ZIP code •	Filter results by ZIP code •	Possible meetup feature •	Possible user join Models Post Table: User ID, Username, Post, Email, Passwords, Products = true or false
